provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Visiting Forces (Designation)
(United Kingdom) Order. 1975.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The United Kingdom is hereby designated as a designated state
for the purposes of all the provisions of the Visiting Forces Act.

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3. The civilian personnel attached to a visiting Force of the United
Kingdom is hereby designated as a civilian component of the visiting
force.
              flhe inclusion of this page is authorized by L.N. 286119761
